plot: A couple of college students take pity on an ex-convict and try to help him locate his lover whom he hasn't seen or heard from in seven years.
title: Noran sonsugeon
plot_es: A couple of college students take pity on an ex-convict and try to help him locate his lover whom he hasn't seen or heard from in seven years.
plot_en: A couple of college students take pity on an ex-convict and try to help him locate his lover whom he hasn't seen or heard from in seven years.
